name: MADHACK
description:
Come and help Mad collect the Orbs and get back to his home.
MADHACK is a 2D platform game in Retro style, with stages created by hand, with precise controls and that provides fun for all types of players.

MADHACK Features

  • A fun and relaxed adventure for all types of players, who like platform games.
  • More than 15 initial levels for the player to explore and discover all possible paths between each level.
  • A good challenge for Speedrunners (the game has a native timer).
